page.title: 08Halesworth Health Services
page.content: At the market place dentist surgery there are 3 dentists;C.G.Chester, R.P.Wagg and W.Bromwells.They do all kinds of treatment including fillings, extractions and orthodontic work.Their patients range from babies to elderly people.The dentists teach people how to brush,clean and look after their gums and teeth. At the market place surgery there are 6 Doctors;Dr.Dickson,Dr.Mair,Dr.Clarke, Dr.Pagan,Dr.Calver and Dr.Northover.It is a National Health surgery.It has over 800 National Health patients and 3 Bupa patients.One of the Doctors works at the Hospital everyday and 2 Doctors are on call at weekends.They do General Practise,Maternity work,they are Police,School and Factory Doctors,they also do some chiropidy work and they are members of the Suffolk Accident Service.
